main event: An unidentified flying object was observed moving across the sky at high speed in San Angelo, Texas on 15 May 1957.
interesting points: The object was silver and round in shape,It moved rapidly in a straight course with no oscillation or tail,The observation lasted for 2 minutes,No photographs were taken or included in the report,The object disappeared below the horizon without a change in speed.
witness description: Civilian, unemployed, familiar with different types of aircraft
